languages.text: {n}Идира хмурится, смотря куда-то сквозь сержанта.{/n} "Хороший ты солдат, но крови на тебе больно много — своей и иной. А ведь рука, что сейчас честь отдает, может и дрогнуть во мраке. Никакие эполеты от горечи не спасут..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Идира хмурится, смотря куда-то сквозь сержанта.{/n} "Хороший ты солдат, но крови у тебя на руках больно много — своей и иной. Рука, что сейчас честь отдает, дрогнет во мраке и стиснет оружие в гневе. Не спасут эполеты от горечи".

languages.text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."
languages.original_text: {n}Идира хмурится, смотря куда-то сквозь сержанта.{/n} "Хороший ты солдат, но крови на тебе больно много — своей и иной. А ведь рука, что сейчас честь отдает, может и дрогнуть во мраке. Никакие эполеты от горечи не спасут..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira frowns as she looks not at the sergeant, but rather through him.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on you — both yours and that of others. You know, the hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

{n}Idira frowns as she looks not at the sergeant, but rather through him.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on you — both yours and that of others. You know, the hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

You know, the same hand that salutes now, might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

You know, the same hand that salutes now, might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

{n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

{n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

languages.text: {n}Idira runzelt die Stirn und ihr Blick wird abwesend, als würde sie durch den Sergeant hindurchblicken.{/n} "Ihr seid ein guter Soldat, doch Ihr habt viel Blut an den Händen — Euer eigenes und das von anderen. Wisst Ihr, dieselbe Hand, die Euch jetzt salutiert, könnte in der Dunkelheit wanken. Euer Rang und Eure Schulterklappen retten Euch nicht vor der Verbitterung ..."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira runzelt die Stirn und ihr Blick wird abwesend, als würde sie durch den Sergeant hindurchblicken.{/n} "Ihr seid ein guter Soldat, doch Ihr habt viel Blut an den Händen — Euer eigenes und das von anderen. Wisst Ihr, dieselbe Hand, die Euch jetzt salutiert, könnte in der Dunkelheit wanken. Euer Rang und Eure Schulterklappen retten Euch nicht vor der Verbitterung ..."

languages.text: {n}Idira fronce les sourcils et son regard se fait lointain, comme si elle cherchait à voir à travers le sergent.{/n} « Vous êtes un bon soldat, mais vous avez beaucoup de sang sur les mains... Le vôtre, mais pas seulement. La main qui salue aujourd'hui risque toujours de trembler dans l'obscurité. Ce ne sont pas les galons qui vous sauveront de la rancœur... »
languages.original_text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira fronce les sourcils et son regard se fait lointain, comme si elle cherchait à voir à travers le sergent.{/n} « Vous êtes un bon soldat, mais vous avez beaucoup de sang sur les mains... Le vôtre, mais pas seulement. La main qui salue aujourd'hui risque toujours de trembler dans l'obscurité. Ce ne sont pas les galons qui vous sauveront de la rancœur... »

languages.text: {n}伊迪拉紧锁眉头，目光越飘越远，似乎穿透了军士。{/n}“你是位优秀的士兵，但你的双手沾满了鲜血，有你自己的血，也有别人的。你知道吗，这只正在敬礼的手，日后恐怕会在黑暗中颤抖。无论是军衔还是肩章，都无法让你摆脱痛苦……”
languages.original_text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}伊迪拉紧锁眉头，目光越飘越远，似乎穿透了军士。{/n}“你是位优秀的士兵，但你的双手沾满了鲜血，有你自己的血，也有别人的。你知道吗，这只正在敬礼的手，日后恐怕会在黑暗中颤抖。无论是军衔还是肩章，都无法让你摆脱痛苦……”

languages.text: {n}イディラは顔をしかめるが、その視線は軍曹を見透かすように遠くを見つめる。{/n}「あなたは優秀な兵士だけど、その手には多くの血が流れているわ。今、敬礼している手も、暗闇の中では弱音を吐くかもしれない。階級や肩章は、あなたを苦しい思いから救ってはくれないのよ…」
languages.original_text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}イディラは顔をしかめるが、その視線は軍曹を見透かすように遠くを見つめる。{/n}「あなたは優秀な兵士だけど、その手には多くの血が流れているわ。今、敬礼している手も、暗闇の中では弱音を吐くかもしれない。階級や肩章は、あなたを苦しい思いから救ってはくれないのよ…」

languages.text: {n}Idira frunce el ceño mientras su mirada se vuelve distante, como si mirara a través del sargento.{/n} «Eres un buen soldado, pero tienes mucha sangre en las manos, tanto tuya como ajena. La misma mano que saluda ahora podría flaquear en la oscuridad. El rango y las hombreras no te salvarán de la tristeza...»
languages.original_text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}Idira frunce el ceño mientras su mirada se vuelve distante, como si mirara a través del sargento.{/n} «Eres un buen soldado, pero tienes mucha sangre en las manos, tanto en las tuyas como en las de los demás. La misma mano que saluda ahora podría flaquear en la oscuridad. El rango y las hombreras no te salvarán de la tristeza...»

languages.text: {n}İdira, insanın âdeta içini gören bakışlarını çavuşa dikip uzaklara dalarken kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "İyi bir askersin ama eline çok kişinin kanı bulaşmış, kendininki dâhil. Şu an tekmil veren el, karanlıkta bocalayabilir. Kıdem ve apolet seni karamsarlıktan korumayacak."
languages.original_text: {n}Idira frowns as her gaze grows distant, as if she is looking through the sergeant.{/n} "You're a good soldier, but you've got a lot of blood on your hands — both yours and others'. You know, the same hand that salutes now might falter in darkness. Rank and epaulettes won't save you from the bitterness..."

traits.locale_text: {n}İdira, insanın âdeta içini gören bakışlarını çavuşa dikip uzaklara dalarken kaşları çatılıyor.{/n} "İyi bir askersin ama eline çok kişinin kanı bulaşmış, kendininki dâhil. Şu an tekmil veren el, karanlıkta bocalayabilir. Kıdem ve apolet seni karamsarlıktan korumayacak."
